name: Boxumo
description:
Boxumo is a local multiplayer action game prototype about a cardboard boxes fighting for glory.

Players each control a Box and aim to score points by pushing their opponent out of the ring. Best enjoyed with beside a good friend / enemy and ample levels of enthusiasm.

Boxumo is the first Chalk In Jam, a prototype built during the 18th week of 2016 by Chalk In Rain.

Chalk In Rain is:

  • Emre Deniz - @Emre_C_Deniz
  • Gerard Delaney - @verbvirus
